eventInfoList.dialogueText: You feel as though you embody winter, as if touching anything would freeze the object to ice.
You look up at them, meeting their gaze.
You keep eye contact for a moment before they break the silence.
"I don't know how to tell you this, @, but you didn't make it."
Your guest allows you a moment to digest the news. You didn't make it.
What, exactly, does that mean? You're about to ask, before they speak once more.
